name: dockstarter
description: DockSTARTer helps users get started with home server apps by automating the configuration of Docker containers using templates. It supports media servers, automation tools, and is ideal for beginner self-hosters.
features: Automated Setup: Configure home server apps automatically. Beginner-friendly deployment.
Template Library: Pre-configured containers for popular apps. Quick stack building.
Media Server Focus: Perfect for Plex, Sonarr, Radarr, and more. Complete media stack.
Guided Configuration: Step-by-step setup process. Easy for newcomers.
Best Practices: Implements recommended configurations. Optimized deployments.
Self-Hosted: Build your home server with confidence. Simplified self-hosting.
